messages.subject: Books, Books, and more Books
messages.msgSnippet: This may not be the proper way to do this but.............Alan, I would like a list of your books for sale. E-mail can be sent to me at
messages.messageBody:
This may not be the proper way to do this but.............Alan, I would
like a list of your books for sale. E-mail can be sent to me at
elliott@... . Curran, I will watch your books on e-bay.
Maybe I will get lucky again.

Nothing else to pass on, I have no questions at the moment for the
group.

I should mention that I purchased Dr. John Lissenden's book 'The Namban
Group of Japanese Sword Guards: A Reappraisal'. It is very good, well
worth the money for anyone seeking knowledge (as I am).

Elliott
